name: quadrato-ufficiali-mongo
description: A Full Stack application with Angular and Express

scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.start: npm start --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"

author: Luca Di Molfetta
